mapper.select: SELECT bs.is_recommend, bs.id, bs.record_id, bs.supplier_id, bs.bidding_id, bp.name FROM bidding_supplier bs left join bas_supplier bp on bs.supplier_id = bp.id where bs.del_flag = '0' and bs.record_id = #{id}

SELECT bs.id, bs.supplier_id, bs.bidding_id, bp.name, bp.corporate, bp.telephone FROM bidding_supplier bs left join bas_supplier bp on bs.supplier_id = bp.id where bs.del_flag = '0' and bs.bidding_id = #{id}

SELECT case when (bm.bidding_status = '3' or bm.bidding_status = '2' or bm.bidding_status = '8') then brs.is_recommend else brtp.is_recommend end is_recommend, brs.id, brs.record_id, bs.supplier_id, bs.bidding_id, bs.item_total, brs.bidding_qty, brs.bs_id, brs.is_contract, brs.is_bargin, bp.name, bsc.contacter, bsc.contacter_tel, bsc.contacter_email, bqr.currency as currency, bqr.create_time as offerTime, bqr.amount_tax as amount, bqr.price_tax, bqr.id as quote_record_id, bqr.tax_rate, bqr.trade_type, bqr.spe_type as sup_spe_type, bqr.brand_name as sup_brand_name, bqr.attachment, bqr.comment FROM bidding_record_supplier brs left join bidding_supplier bs on brs.bs_id = bs.id left join bas_supplier bp on brs.supplier_id = bp.id left join bas_supplier_contact bsc on bp.id = bsc.supplier_id and bsc.del_flag = '0' and bsc.is_default = '1' left join ( select brtp.bs_id,brtp.is_recommend from bidding_record_to_professionals brtp where brtp.del_flag = '0' and is_recommend = '1' group by brtp.bs_id ) brtp on bs.id = brtp.bs_id left join bidding_main bm on brs.bidding_id = bm.id left join ( select bqr.supp_id, bqr.bidding_id, bqr.record_id, bqr.amount_tax, bqr.price_tax, bqr.id, bqr.spe_type, bqr.brand_name, bqr.comment, concat_ws(',',bq.attachment,bq.other_attachment) as attachment, bq.tax_rate, bq.create_time, bq.currency, bq.trade_type from bidding_quote_record bqr left join bidding_quote bq on bqr.quote_id = bq.id where bqr.del_flag = '0' ) bqr on brs.supplier_id = bqr.supp_id and brs.bidding_id = bqr.bidding_id and brs.record_id = bqr.record_id where bs.del_flag = '0' and bs.bidding_id = #{id} order by bs.item_total desc
